isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Model - ELECTRONIC GAUGE CLUSTER - REMOVE AND INSTALL - FUEL, VOLTS, WATER OR ENGINE OIL GAUGES

svcproc.title: FUEL, VOLTS, WATER OR ENGINE OIL GAUGES
svcproc.para: The Fuel, Volts, Water and Engine Oil Gauges may be integral components of the EGC circuit board. If they are not separate gauges they can be removed and replaced by scoring the perforated line between the gauges and the main circuit board and snapping the circuit board. The replacement gauge is fastened to the EGC body with two screws and connected to the main circuit board with the supplied cable with connectors.

figure.caption: Typical EGC Circuit Board Gauge Connector Location

svcproc.para: The speedometer and tachometer cannot be individually replaced. If the speedometer or tachometer fail, the entire circuit board must be replaced.
